txt.en: The avanc lays motionless on the ground
This avanc is clearly dead, but its rider has no idea
Rook is getting extremely frustrated that his avanc will not rise and continue on their journey.

'Puzzling... very puzzling, indeed. You should give him a good talking to, perhaps I was too gruff with him earlier.\n\n'Yes, that will surely work. Just make sure you get his attention first, he can be very easily distracted.'
As Rook's avanc is his steed of sorts, whistling might be a good way to call him.\n\nThe avanc can be found under Rook to the west of Snowbourn.
'Dead? I don't believe you. He was fine just a moment ago!\n\n'You just don't know how to talk to him, here let me try again!'
Whistling didn't prove helpful, so perhaps a more direct approach would work.\n\nThe avanc can be found under Rook to the west of Snowbourn.
The avanc can be found under Rook to the west of Snowbourn.
'...'\n\nThis avanc has clearly reached the end of its days. It is a wonder that Rook has not realized this yet. Perhaps the best thing would be to tell Rook the truth.
Rook can be found to the west of Snowbourn.
Whistle and try to grab the avanc's attention
Attempt to speak to the avanc
